div.a: From carpentry to welding, our construction programs produce highly skilled tradesman.

div.style: width: auto; height: auto; left: auto; top: auto;

div.a: Get ahead in the world of science! Choose from programs like electronics and biotechnology.

div.style: width: auto; height: auto; left: auto; top: auto;

div.a: Interested in business and technology? Choose from a wide range of exciting programs of study.

div.style: width: auto; height: auto; left: auto; top: auto;

div.a: Gain expertise in cosmetology, culinary arts, early childhood education and more!

div.style: width: auto; height: auto; left: auto; top: auto;

div.a: Set a solid foundation for careers in various healthcare settings, including nursing and dental assisting.

div.class: column sm-1-1 md-1-2 lg-1-3 bg-1 text-center

blockquote.p: NCCVT School District delivers world-class Career and Technical programs combined with rigorous academic curricula to equip students with the 21st century skills that will best serve the State of Delaware, and the global community.

h5.a: Board Meeting
Interim Report Date
Interim Available in HAC
Board Meeting
Last Day for Seniors

a.title: delcastle
hodgson
Howard
St. Georges

p.img: Delcastle offers a variety of educational experiences for students integrating academic courses with practical vocational-technical problem solving. Lessons learned in math and English are re-enforced in the studentâs career program.

div.p: Students are encouraged to achieve their full potential and to participate in student organizations. A full complement of athletic programs, academic, and vocational clubs is offered.

p.img: Built in 1974, Hodgson has approximately 1,100 students enrolled in its full-time career training programs.

div.p: Hodgsonâs faculty is committed to seeking ways to improve student achievement through innovative teaching techniques. The school operates under a block schedule and incorporates a high degree of active student learning and personalization.

p.img: Howard provides a rigorous, comprehensive, vocational technical program in a modern setting with deep historical roots.

div.p: Howardâs award-winning 1:1 iPad initiative has provided an unprecedented opportunity for students to learn 21st century skills in a project-based setting.

p.img: The newest comprehensive, 1000-pupil VoTech high school opened in November 2006.

div.p: The school offers comprehensive high school academic curricula and career and technical training in the areas of Health, Service and Science Technologies, Construction and Mechanical Technologies, and Information Technology.

p.img: Each year, one-fourth of all eighth-grade students attending New Castle County public schools apply for admission to a VoTech high school. Students who are accepted begin in a ninth grade exploratory program, which exposes them to career options before they elect a specific course of study. They can choose to study one of 40 different careers in one of six clusters.

div.h4: New Castle County by the Numbers

div.class: grid sm-grid-1 md-grid-2 lg-grid-4 gap-30 rev15 text-center

div.p: The percentage of Seniors Earning Proficient or Exemplary Career Program Certificates.
The percentage of eligible seniors in cooperative employment.
Seniors that are dual enrolled with a college or university have a 90% pass rate.
Dual enrollment is on the rise with student enrollment increasing by 247% from 2014.
